table.value: CREATE TABLE `wb_member_fields` ( `id` int(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tag` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ftype` int(4) NOT NULL, `orders` int(4) NOT NULL, `ls` int(1) NOT NULL, `sys` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=17 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
